segments.text: Hey, Joey, could you pass the cheese?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Listen uh, I'd prefer it if you didn't call me Joey.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Since I don't know anyone here, I thought it'd be cool to try out a cool work nickname.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Hey, dragon! Here's your tips from Monday and Tuesday.
segments.speaker: A Waiter

segments.text: There's like-there's like 300 bucks in this one!
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Yeah, people get pretty generous around the holidays. And it never hurts to wear tight trousers.
segments.speaker: The Waiter

segments.text: Could the waiters gather around to hear tonight's specials?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Okay, first there is a Chilean Sea Bass prepared with a Mango relish on a bagâ€”Why is nobody writing these down?
segments.speaker: Monica

segments.text: Because your all gonna make up fake specials and make me cook them like you did the other night?
segments.speaker: Monica
